title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 567.4 - Program administration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 567.4 - Program administration

State Regulations

The Governor's Office of Employee Relations (GOER) will
develop and issue guidelines for program operation, including specifics on
nominations, judging criteria, selection process, etc. Agencies will establish
committees to review nominees' achievements and make recommendations of award
recipients and award amounts to the agency head. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
567.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
